item.title: Presenting at Python Saigon
item.description: I had the opportunity to present on “Communicating Results in R” at the weekly Python Saigon Meetup, on Feb 25, 2017 in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. We had a great discussion and shared data visualization tools and techniques. Materials are available on my GitHub, including a RPres slide deck with links and resources for learning R and data visualization. Presenting at Python Saigon
